declarations.comments:
Text metrics:

- The text width in pixels.
declarations.title: TextMetrics

declarations.comments: Enumerates types of text baseline.
declarations.title: TextBaseline

declarations.comments: Enumerates types of text alignment.
declarations.title: TextAlign

declarations.comments:
A type representing a radial gradient.
 -  Starting circle center coordinates: (`x0`, `y0`)
 -  Starting circle radius: `r0`
 -  Ending circle center coordinates: (`x1`, `y1`)
 -  Ending circle radius: `r1`
declarations.title: RadialGradient

declarations.comments: Enumerates the different types of pattern repetitions.
declarations.title: PatternRepeat

declarations.comments:
A type representing a linear gradient.
 -  Starting point coordinates: (`x0`, `y0`)
 -  Ending point coordinates: (`x1`, `y1`)
declarations.title: LinearGradient

declarations.comments: Enumerates the different types of line join
declarations.title: LineJoin

declarations.comments: Enumerates the different types of line cap.
declarations.title: LineCap

declarations.comments: An image data object, used to store raster data outside the canvas.
declarations.title: ImageData

declarations.comments: Canvas dimensions (width and height) in pixels.
declarations.title: Dimensions

declarations.comments: A 2D graphics context.
declarations.title: Context2D

declarations.comments: Enumerates the different types of composite operations and blend modes.
declarations.title: Composite

declarations.comments: Opaque object describing a pattern.
declarations.title: CanvasPattern

declarations.comments: Opaque object for drawing elements and things to the canvas.
declarations.title: CanvasImageSource

declarations.comments: Opaque object describing a gradient.
declarations.title: CanvasGradient

declarations.comments: Get the width of an `ImageData` object.
declarations.title: imageDataWidth

declarations.comments: Get the height of an `ImageData` object.
declarations.title: imageDataHeight

declarations.comments: Get the underlying buffer from an `ImageData` object.
declarations.title: imageDataBuffer

declarations.comments:
The `MonadCanvasAction` class captures those monads which support canvas
actions.

Instances are provided for `CanvasAction`, `CanvasAff`, and the standard
monad transformers.

`liftCanvasAction` can be used in any appropriate monad transformer stack
to lift an action of type `CanvasAction a` into the monad.
declarations.title: MonadCanvasAction

declarations.comments:
The `MonadCanvasAff` class captures those monads which support canvas
actions and `Aff`s.

Instances are provided for `CanvasAff` and the standard monad transformers.

`liftCanvasAff` can be used in any appropriate monad transformer stack
to lift an action of type `CanvasAff a` into the monad.
declarations.title: MonadCanvasAff

declarations.comments:
The `CanvasAff` monad is a monad transformer stack, more specifically
the `ReaderT` monad transformer applied to the `Aff` monad, reading a
value of type `Context2D`.
declarations.title: CanvasAff

declarations.comments:
The `CanvasAction` monad is a monad transformer stack, more specifically
the `ReaderT` monad transformer applied to the `Effect` monad, reading a
value of type `Context2D`.
declarations.title: CanvasAction

declarations.comments: Run a `CanvasAff` in a `MonadAff`, on the provided `Context2D`.
declarations.title: runCanvasAff

declarations.comments: Run a `CanvasAction` in a `MonadEffect`, on the provided `Context2D`.
declarations.title: runAction

modules.name: Graphics.CanvasAction
modules.comments:
This module defines functions for working with the HTML5 Canvas in a
`MonadCanvasAction` (e.g. `CanvasAction`). This is to make canvas actions
composable without having to worry about passing a `Context2D` argument to
every function.

declarations.comments: Create an `HTMLCanvasElement` of the given size in any `MonadCanvasAction`
declarations.title: createCanvas

declarations.comments:
Same as `createCanvas`, but allows for specifying the `Document` object to
create the canvas with
declarations.title: createCanvas'

declarations.comments:
Run a `CanvasAction` in a `MonadEffect`, on a created canvas with the
provided size. This can be useful for creating patterns for use as a
fillStyle or strokeStyle.

For example:

```purescript
action ∷ ∀ m. MonadCanvasAction m ⇒ m Unit
action = do
  pattern ← runActionOffscreen (20.0 >< 20.0) do
    filled "#aaf" fillRectFull
    filled "#afa" $ fillRect (makeRect 0.0 10.0 10.0 10.0)
    filled "#faa" $ fillRect (makeRect 10.0 0.0 10.0 10.0)
    imageSource >>= (_ `createPattern` Repeat)
  (fillWith pattern Nonzero <=< runPath) do
    circle (200.0 >< 200.0) 175.0
    circle ( 50.0 ><  50.0)  50.0
    circle ( 50.0 >< 350.0)  50.0
    circle (350.0 ><  50.0)  50.0
    circle (350.0 >< 350.0)  50.0
```
declarations.title: runActionOffscreen

declarations.comments:
Run a `CanvasAction` in a `MonadCanvasAction`, on a created canvas with
the same size as the "main" canvas. This can be useful for creating
patterns for use as a fillStyle or strokeStyle. See `runActionOffscreen`
for an example.
declarations.title: runActionOffscreen'

declarations.comments:
Runs a `CanvasAction` in a `MonadEffect` inside a functor context. Useful
for turning a function that returns a `CanvasAction` into a function that
returns an `Effect`.
declarations.title: asEffect

declarations.comments:
From a function taking some region and returning a `MonadCanvasAction`,
make a `MonadCanvasAction` that calls the original function with the whole
canvas as the region. This can for example be used to draw an image scaled
to fill the entire canvas: `withFull \r → drawImageScale r image`
declarations.title: withFull

declarations.comments:
From a function taking some position and returning a `MonadCanvasAction`,
make a `MonadCanvasAction` that calls the original function with the center
of the canvas as a position.
declarations.title: withMidPos

declarations.comments: Get the canvas in a `MonadCanvasAction`
declarations.title: getCanvas

declarations.comments: Get the canvas rendering context in a `MonadCanvasAction`
declarations.title: getCtx

declarations.comments: Fill a rectangular area
declarations.title: fillRect

declarations.comments: Fill a rectangular area that covers the entire canvas
declarations.title: fillRectFull

declarations.comments: Stroke a rectangular area
declarations.title: strokeRect

declarations.comments: Stroke a rectangular area that covers the entire canvas
declarations.title: strokeRectFull

declarations.comments: Clear a rectangular area
declarations.title: clearRect

declarations.comments: Clear a rectangular area that covers the entire canvas
declarations.title: clearRectFull

declarations.comments:
A value that can be passed to `setFillStyle` and similar functions.
Runtime representation should be either a `String`, a `CanvasGradient` or
a `CanvasPattern`.
declarations.title: CanvasStyleRep

declarations.comments: Class describing types that can be turned into a valid `CanvasStyleRep`
declarations.title: CanvasStyle

declarations.comments:
Class describing types that can be turned into a string representing a
canvas color.
declarations.title: CanvasColor

declarations.comments:
Run a `MonadCanvasAction` with the given fillStyle, resetting it to the
previous value after
declarations.title: filled

declarations.comments:
Run a `MonadCanvasAction` with the given strokeStyle, resetting it to the
previous value after
declarations.title: stroked

declarations.comments: Set x and y shadow offset at the same time
declarations.title: setShadowOffset

declarations.comments: Create a data URL for the current canvas contents
declarations.title: toDataUrl

declarations.comments:
Render image data on the canvas. The first argument (`p`) is the point on
the canvas to place the topleft of the data. The second argument (`r`) is
the region of the `ImageData` to render.
declarations.title: putImageDataFull

declarations.comments:
Render image data on the canvas. The first argument (`p`) is the point on
the canvas to place the topleft of the data.
declarations.title: putImageData

declarations.comments: Draw an image, scaled to fit the provided region
declarations.title: drawImageScale

declarations.comments:
Draw an image on the canvas. The first arugment is the region of the source
image to draw, and the second argument is the region on the canvas to draw
it in.
declarations.title: drawImageFull

declarations.comments:
Asynchronously load an image file by specifying its path and a callback
`CanvasAction Unit`.
declarations.title: tryLoadImage

declarations.comments:
Asynchronously load an image file by specifying its path and a callback
`Effect Unit`.
declarations.title: tryLoadImage'

declarations.comments:
Asynchrounously load an image file by specifying its path. The returned
`MonadAff` will throw an error if the image wasn't found.
declarations.title: loadImageAff

declarations.comments: Set the context's `imageSmoothingEnabled` property
declarations.title: setImageSmoothing

declarations.comments:
Create a canvas pattern from an image, which can be used as a fill- or
strokeStyle
declarations.title: createPattern

declarations.comments:
Create a linear gradient from a start point, end point, and a foldable of
color stops.
declarations.title: linearGradient

declarations.comments:
Create a radial gradient from a starting circle, ending circle, and a
foldable of color stops.
declarations.title: radialGradient

declarations.comments:
Constructs a blank linear `CanvasGradient` that can be modified with
`addColorStop`.
declarations.title: createLinearGradient

declarations.comments:
Constructs a blank radial `CanvasGradient` that can be modified with
`addColorStop`.
declarations.title: createRadialGradient

declarations.comments:
Note: Mutates the original `CanvasGradient` and returns `Unit`.
It is recommended to construct gradients with `linearGradient` and
`radialGradient` instead.
declarations.title: addColorStop

declarations.comments: Saves the context, see [`save` on MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/save)
declarations.title: save

declarations.comments: Restores the context, see [`restore` on MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/restore)
declarations.title: restore

declarations.comments: Runs `save`, then the provided action, then `restore`
declarations.title: restoreAfter

modules.name: Graphics.CanvasAction.CSSOM
modules.comments:
Some functions from the CSSOM spec that are useful for canvas code. These
might move to another package in the future.

declarations.comments:
The `MonadCanvasAction` class captures those monads which support canvas
actions.

Instances are provided for `CanvasAction`, `CanvasAff`, and the standard
monad transformers.

`liftCanvasAction` can be used in any appropriate monad transformer stack
to lift an action of type `CanvasAction a` into the monad.
declarations.title: MonadCanvasAction

declarations.comments:
The `MonadCanvasAff` class captures those monads which support canvas
actions and `Aff`s.

Instances are provided for `CanvasAff` and the standard monad transformers.

`liftCanvasAff` can be used in any appropriate monad transformer stack
to lift an action of type `CanvasAff a` into the monad.
declarations.title: MonadCanvasAff

declarations.comments:
A record with data for the start of the current subpath and the location of
the path cursor
declarations.title: PathData

declarations.comments:
A data type that contains a JavaScript `Path2D` object and `PathData`. The
constructor is not exported because that would allow for desync between the
JS `Path2D` and its data.
declarations.title: Path2D

declarations.comments: Get the cursor position of the path
declarations.title: getCursor

declarations.comments: Get the start position of the current subpath
declarations.title: getSubpathStart

declarations.comments: Start a new sub-path at the given position
declarations.title: moveTo

declarations.comments:
Draw a line from the current position to the starting position of the
sub-path
declarations.title: closePath

declarations.comments: Draw a line from the last point in the sub-path to the given position
declarations.title: lineTo

declarations.comments:
Adds a quadratic Bézier curve to the path. The first point is the control
point and the second one is the end point.
declarations.title: quadraticCurveTo

declarations.comments:
Adds a cubic Bézier curve to the path. The first two points are control
points and the third one is the end point.
declarations.title: bezierCurveTo

declarations.comments: Add the contents of a `Path2D` to the current path
declarations.title: addPath

declarations.comments:
Add the contents of a `Path2D` to the current path, transforming it
according to the provided `DOMMatrix`
declarations.title: addPath'

declarations.comments: Enumerates the different fill rules
declarations.title: FillRule

declarations.comments: Create a `Path2D` from a `PathAction`
declarations.title: runPath

declarations.comments: Fill a `Path2D`
declarations.title: fill

declarations.comments: Fill a `Path2D` with the given style
declarations.title: fillWith

declarations.comments: Stroke a `Path2D`
declarations.title: stroke

declarations.comments: Stroke a `Path2D` with the given style
declarations.title: strokeWith

declarations.comments: Clip subsequent canvas drawings to a `Path2D`
declarations.title: clip

declarations.comments: Move the cursor to a new position relative to its old position
declarations.title: moveBy

declarations.comments:
Draw a line from the last point in the sub-path to the given position,
measured relative to its old position
declarations.title: lineBy

declarations.comments: Move to the first point and draw a line to the second point
declarations.title: line

declarations.comments:
Append lines between all the specified points to the current subpath. First
draws a line from the cursor position to the first point.
declarations.title: lines

declarations.comments:
Draw a polygon with the specified points. Starts and ends on the first
point.
declarations.title: polygon

declarations.comments:
Draw a circle with the specified center and radius. Ends on the rightmost
point of the circle.
declarations.title: circle

declarations.comments:
Like `arcTo`, but the first point is relative to the cursor position, and
the second point is relative to the first point
declarations.title: arcBy

declarations.comments:
Like `arcTo_`, but the first point is relative to the cursor position, and
the second point is relative to the first point
declarations.title: arcBy_

declarations.comments: Aborts the current subpath and starts a new one at the cursor position
declarations.title: abortSubpath

declarations.comments: Proxy for `"ctx"`
declarations.title: _ctx

declarations.comments: Runs a `CTX` reader effect.
declarations.title: runCtx

declarations.comments: Lift a `CanvasAction` into `Run` via the `ctx` and `effect` labels
declarations.title: liftCanvasAction

declarations.comments: Lift a `CanvasAction` into `Run` via the provided labels
declarations.title: liftCanvasActionAt

declarations.comments: Runs `CTX` and `EFFECT` effects in `CanvasAction`
declarations.title: runBaseCanvas

declarations.comments:
Runs `Reader Context2D` and `Effect` in `CanvasAction` at the provided
labels
declarations.title: runBaseCanvasAt

declarations.comments: Lift a `CanvasAff` into `Run` via the `ctx` and `aff` labels
declarations.title: liftCanvasAff

declarations.comments: Lift a `CanvasAff` into `Run` via the provided labels
declarations.title: liftCanvasAffAt

declarations.comments: Runs `CTX` and `AFF` effects in `CanvasAff`
declarations.title: runBaseCanvasAff

declarations.comments: Runs `Reader Context2D` and `Aff` in `CanvasAff` at the provided labels
declarations.title: runBaseCanvasAffAt

declarations.comments: Runs `CTX`, `EFFECT`, and `AFF` effects in `CanvasAff`
declarations.title: runBaseCanvasAff'

declarations.comments:
Runs `Reader Context2D`, `Effect`, and `Aff` in `CanvasAff` at the provided
labels
declarations.title: runBaseCanvasAffAt'

declarations.comments: Gets the current transformation matrix
declarations.title: getTransform

declarations.comments: Sets the transformation matrix to the given DOMMatrix
declarations.title: setTransform

declarations.comments: Resets the transformation matrix
declarations.title: resetTransform

declarations.comments:
Applies the given transformation, runs the given action, and returns the
transformation matrix to its previous state.
declarations.title: transformedBy

declarations.comments:
Sets the transformation matrix to the given DOMMatrix, runs the given
action, and returns the transformation matrix to its previous state.
declarations.title: transformedTo

declarations.comments: Applies a tranformation matrix to a point
declarations.title: transformPoint

declarations.comments: Constructs a DOMMatrix that applies a translation
declarations.title: translate

declarations.comments: Constructs a DOMMatrix that applies a scaling
declarations.title: scale

declarations.comments: Constructs a DOMMatrix that applies a rotation
declarations.title: rotate

declarations.comments: Constructs a DOMMatrix that applies a rotation around the specified point
declarations.title: rotateAround

declarations.comments: Constructs a DOMMatrix that applies a skewing
declarations.title: skew

declarations.comments:
The `CanvasAction` monad is a monad transformer stack, more specifically
the `ReaderT` monad transformer applied to the `Effect` monad, reading a
value of type `Context2D`.
declarations.title: CanvasAction

declarations.comments: Run a `CanvasAction` in a `MonadEffect`, on the provided `Context2D`.
declarations.title: runAction

declarations.comments:
The `CanvasAff` monad is a monad transformer stack, more specifically
the `ReaderT` monad transformer applied to the `Aff` monad, reading a
value of type `Context2D`.
declarations.title: CanvasAff

declarations.comments: Run a `CanvasAff` in a `MonadAff`, on the provided `Context2D`.
declarations.title: runCanvasAff
